t.desc:
The ID to this file must be five characters long. The format being one alphabetic character followed by any four characters.
Five records are available in this table to augment the standard frequencies.
The ID of available records
and their functionality are listed below:
LWEEK Returns the last working day of
week.
LMNTH Returns the calendar end date of
month.
LQUAT Returns the calendar end date of
quarter
(31 March, 30 June, 30 September and 31 December)
LHFYR Returns the calendar end date of
half year (30 June and 31 December)
LYEAR Returns the calendar end date of
year
(31 December)
Validation Rules:
1 alphabetic character followed by any 4 characters.
The ID must not be any of the following values: BSNSS TWMTH DAILY WEEK followed by any character M followed by 4 numeric characters
